availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles R. Samuels (Bullitt Circuit Court clerk)

body.p: Residence: Shepherdsville, Bullitt County, KY. Bullitt County, Kentucky-born clerk of the Bullitt Circuit Court. Son of Robert and Malinda Samuels.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, Shepherdsville, p. 1.

Find A Grave, Entry for Charles R. Samuels (1834-1866), Find A Grave Memorial # 6875012, Old City Cemetery, Shepherdsville, Bullitt County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=samuels&GSfn=charles&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=6875012&df=all& (accessed 31 May 2017).
